what.title: What is this?
what.text: The Language Friends is a children’s English picture book series made for reading together at home.
what.extra: Each book teaches simple patterns through clear pictures and everyday moments.

who.title: Who is it for?
who.text: For young children and parents who want to enjoy English together, even if they don’t speak English confidently.
who.extra: Perfect for families who want a gentle routine they can start anytime.

why.title: Why is it safe and easy?
why.text: Simple sentences, gentle repetition, and friendly characters help children learn naturally, without pressure or testing.
why.extra: Kids can listen, repeat, and build confidence at their own pace.

homeSectionTwo.sectionSubtitle: A simple, gentle way for children to start learning English with confidence.

sectionA.title: Built for Natural Learning
sectionA.textA: The Language Friends is designed to help children learn English the same way they learn their first language through repetition, familiarity, and everyday experiences.
sectionA.textB: Instead of focusing on rules, children see and hear the same patterns again and again until they begin to feel natural.

sectionB.title: Made for Real Families
sectionB.textA: Each book is created for families who want to learn together, even if parents are not confident English speakers themselves.
sectionB.textB: The structure is simple and predictable, making it easy to read together without pressure or preparation.

sectionC.title: Learning Through Daily Life
sectionC.textA: The stories focus on everyday moments—eating, playing, going outside—so children can connect language to their own experiences.
sectionC.textB: By seeing English used in familiar situations, children begin to understand meaning naturally and gain confidence over time.

homeSectionThree.title: Meet The Language Friends!
homeSectionThree.intro: Get to know The Language Friends and meet the characters who guide children through gentle English learning.

moko.name: Moko
moko.text: Moko is adventurous and curious. He loves taking walks, exploring new places, and trying fun things.

niko.name: Niko
niko.text: Niko is gentle and kind. She enjoys quiet moments, learning new things, and helping her friends.

okja.name: Okja
okja.text: Okja is energetic and playful. He’s always moving, making noise, and turning everyday moments into fun.

like.title: The Like Series
like.text: Children learn simple sentence patterns using “like” through familiar activities, food, and everyday moments.

verb.title: The Verb Series
verb.text: This series introduces basic action verbs through movement, play, and daily routines children already know.

adjective.title: The Adjective Series
adjective.text: Children explore describing words like big, small, happy, and sad using clear visual comparisons.

dislike.title: The Doesn’t Like Series
dislike.text: This series helps children express preferences and feelings by learning how to say what they don’t like.

friends.title: The Friends Series
friends.text: Children learn social language through friendships, sharing, and simple interactions between characters.
